name: BDDRSC
short_description:
interested in Computer-aided Verification (CAV) are cordially invited to join the
BDDRSC project. The project aims at developing a tool that accepts SystemC file and translates
it into Reduced Ordered Binary Decision Diagram (ROBDD).
SystemC is positioned as the forerunner in Electronic System Level (ESL) modeling and
simulation languages. It extends the capabilities of C++ by enabling the modeling of concurrent
hardware descriptions. In this project, only the RTL synthesizable subset of SystemC for
combinational logic modeling will be translated into ROBDD.
ROBDD is a canonical representation for Boolean functions which is widely used in formal
verification tools. The developed tool should be capable of accepting tw
summary: it is a project about systemc
